title: If Diplomacy Fails In Iran, U.S. Could Face A Grim Mideast War
teaser: The announcement of a nuclear deal with Iran was met with celebration in Tehran, but reaction in the U.S. was subdued. Some in Congress want to scuttle the agreement. But what other options are there?
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
